project.name: Kolab
project.description: The Kolab2/Gentoo project maintains the Kolab Server packages within the Portage Tree.

longdescription.p: The Kolab Project provides a powerful groupware server that works together with a variety of clients (Outlook, Kontact, Thunderbird, Horde Webmail ...) and is a complete free software solution.

The server has been traditionally only packaged for the OpenPKG distribution which you can install as a "distribution within a distribution" within many Linux distributions. The Kolab2/Gentoo project tries to provide packages that allow you to install the server directly in the Gentoo environment without using OpenPKG.

goals.p: The goal of the Kolab2/Gentoo project is to get the Kolab2 Server available via Portage and maintain the necessary packages in the tree.

body.p: The installation instructions for Kolab2/Gentoo are managed within the Kolab wiki.
To get a general overview over the Kolab Groupware server you should visit the Kolab project site.
The project specific overlay on the Gentoo overlays site still needs to be created.
All documentation concerning the Kolab2/Gentoo project is accessible via a special portal page within the main Kolab wiki.
You can also discuss the project using the Kolab2/Gentoo forum.
Currently using the Kolab users mailing lists is the recommended option. But there will be another project specific mailing list created soon.

Currently the best location for submitting bugs concerning the Kolab2/Gentoo project is the Kolab bug tracker. The correct topic for such bugs is of course gentoo.
You can also submit bugs on the Gentoo bug tracker but we are currently just setting up this project so the correct assignee is still missing there.
For direct questions you may try to contact us over IRC. The project specific channel is #gentoo-kolab and the general Kolab crowd can be found at #kolab.
If you ask for help on #kolab you should always make it clear that you are using Kolab2/Gentoo rather than Kolab2/OpenPKG. Otherwise the answers you get might simply not solve your problem.
